vote.title: To authorize the Director of Public Utilities to enter into Indefinite Quantity Agreement Contracts with Ohio Mulch Supply, Inc. and Quasar Energy Group LLC-North Tree Farm for the Deep Row Hybrid Poplar Tree Farm #2 Program; and to authorize the expenditure of $1,840,000.00 from the Sanitary Sewerage Operating Fund; and to waive the competitive bidding provisions of City Code;  ($1,840,000.00)
vote.description: A motion was made by Rob Dorans, seconded by Nicholas Bankston, that this Ordinance be Approved. The motion carried by the following vote:
